summary: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head D.J. refuses to play them.
cast: Brendan Fraser|Steve Buscemi|Adam Sandler|Chris Farley|Michael McKean|Judd Nelson|Ernie Hudson|Amy Locane|Nina Siemaszko|Marshall Bell|Reg E. Cathey|David Arquette|Michael Richards|Joe Mantegna|Michelle Hurst|Allen Covert|Sarah Reinhardt|Lexie Bigham|Lydell M. Cheshier|Sam Whipple|Uri Horowitz|Dana Jackson|Ryan Holihan|Kurt Loder|Tiiu Leek|Kurek Ashley|Pablo Alvear|Alejandro Quezada|Harold Ramis|China Kantner|Rebecca Donner|Vinnie DeRamus|Lemmy|Rich Wilkes|John Melendez|John Zarchen|Rennie Pincus|Zander Lehmann|Mike Judge|Ben Huggins|Mitchell Dane Sonnier|Monty Colvin|Alan Doss|Rob Zombie|Bunga Hosoi|Mark Bringelson|Phil 'Philo' Buerstatte|Jaime H. Campos|Susan Claridge|Dave Corsile|Kristen Fick|Bonnie Gillespie|Joe Martinez|Jennifer Holliday Morrison|Bob Pepper|Gary Schutt|Peter Wick|Sean Yseult|Jay Yuenger
title: Cabezas huecas
